cards.name: Acid Splash
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Deal 3 damage. Draw a card.

cards.name: Acid Splash+
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Deal 5 damage. Draw a card.

cards.name: Blade Burst
cards.description:
Lose 1 Strength. Deal 11 damage. Add a Magic Weapon to your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blade Burst+
cards.description:
Lose 1 Strength. Deal 14 damage. Add a Magic Weapon+ to your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Gain 2 Block. Draw a card.

cards.name: Prestidigitation+
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Gain 4 Block. Draw a card.

cards.name: Ray Of Frost
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Deal 2 damage. Gain 1 Block. Draw a card.

cards.name: Ray Of Frost+
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Deal 3 damage. Gain 2 Block. Draw a card.

cards.name: Read Magic
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. Exhaust.

cards.name: Read Magic+
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Spark
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a [#5299DC]Spell[] or an [#FF5252]Arte[].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spark+
cards.description:
mysticmod:Cantrip.
Draw a card, then gain [E] if the card is a [#5299DC]Spell[] or an [#FF5252]Arte[].

cards.name: Summon Familiar
cards.description:
Summon your faithful Fox Familiar.
Exhaust.
Currently disabled!

cards.name: Summon Familiar+
cards.description:
Summon your faithful Fox Familiar.
Exhaust.
Currently disabled!

cards.name: Arcane Dodge
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain an additional 4 Block.

cards.name: Arcane Dodge+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain an additional 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Shocking Grasp
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal 14 damage instead.

cards.name: Shocking Grasp+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal 18 damage instead.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Alacrity
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Alacrity+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Bulk Up
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block, then Exhaust a random card in your hand.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Choose if and what to Exhaust.

cards.name: Bulk Up+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block, then Exhaust a random card in your hand.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Choose if and what to Exhaust.

cards.name: Components Pouch
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage, then deal 6 damage for each [#5299DC]Spell[] in your hand.
For 2 turns, all Defends count as [#5299DC]Spells[].

cards.name: Components Pouch+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage, then deal 8 damage for each [#5299DC]Spell[] in your hand.
For 3 turns, all Defends count as [#5299DC]Spells[].

cards.name: Corrosive Touch
cards.description: Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Corrosive Touch+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Begin next turn with one [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Disengage
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Begin next turn with one [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Disengage+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Begin next turn with one [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Diversion
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Diversion+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Divining Blow
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Draw 1 card for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Divining Blow+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Draw 1 card for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Heavy Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Increase this card's damage by 3 permanently.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heavy Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Increase this card's damage by 5 permanently.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal 10 damage instead.

cards.name: Lightning Bolt+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Deal 14 damage instead.

cards.name: Power Slash
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Gain an additional stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Power Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Gain an additional stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Probe
cards.description: Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Probe+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Begin next turn with one [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Pure Instinct
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block, then gain 5 Block for each [#FF5252]Arte[] in your hand.
For 2 turns, all Strikes count as [#FF5252]Artes[].

cards.name: Pure Instinct+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block, then gain 7 Block for each [#FF5252]Arte[] in your hand.
For 3 turns, all Strikes count as [#FF5252]Artes[].

cards.name: Riposte
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Riposte+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Shield
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Shield+

Gain 6 Block.
Gain 6 Block next turn.

Deal 3 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Sideswipe+

cards.name: Snowball

Gain an additional stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Snowball+

Gain an additional stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Sudden Clarity

Gain 7 Block.
Draw a card.

Gain 7 Block.
Draw 2 cards.

Add 2 random mysticmod:Cantrips to your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tome Of Spells+

Add 3 random mysticmod:Cantrips to your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: 5 Foot Step+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: All In
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Become Weak for 3 turns. Weak amount is reduced for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: All In+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Become Weak for 3 turns. Weak amount is reduced for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Blade Master
cards.description: Return up to 2 [#FF5252]Artes[] from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Blade Master+
cards.description: Return up to 2 [#FF5252]Artes[] from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Bladed Dash

Deal 6 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Bladed Dash+
cards.description:

[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Bladework+

cards.name: Charged Parry

[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Gain 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Charged Parry+

Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Combo Caster
cards.description: At the start of each turn, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand and draw 1 less card.

cards.name: Combo Caster+
cards.description: At the start of each turn, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand and draw 1 less card.

cards.name: Cure Light Wounds

Gain 2 Regen.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
cards.description:
Gain 3 Regen.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dedication

Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Dedication+1
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength and Dexterity.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Earthen Wall
cards.description: Gain 12 Block. Gain 4 Dexterity this turn.

cards.name: Earthen Wall+
cards.description: Gain 15 Block. Gain 5 Dexterity this turn.

cards.name: Ebb and Flow
cards.description: Each turn, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card unless you have a [#5299DC]Spell[] and 1 card unless you have an [#FF5252]Arte[].

cards.name: Ebb and Flow+
cards.description:
Innate.
Each turn, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card unless you have a [#5299DC]Spell[] and 1 card unless you have an [#FF5252]Arte[].

cards.name: Energized Rift
cards.description:
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Energized Rift+
cards.description:
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Add a random Upgraded mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Feint
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your draw pile.

cards.name: Feint+

cards.name: Floating Disk

Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Floating Disk+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 2 Dexterity. Exhaust.

cards.name: Flourish

cards.name: Flourish+
cards.description: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal 6 damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.

cards.name: Flurry
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage 2 times.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: !mysticmod:M2! times instead

cards.name: Flurry+
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage 3 times.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: !mysticmod:M2! times instead

cards.name: Fly
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Fly+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Grapple
cards.description:
Stun the target. Can't use the same turn as an Attack.
Ethereal. Exhaust.

cards.name: Grapple+
cards.description:
Stun the target. Can't use the same turn as an Attack.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grease
cards.description:
Target enemy loses 4 Strength this turn.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Grease+
cards.description:
Target enemy loses 6 Strength this turn.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: ALL enemies instead.

cards.name: Hunker Down
cards.description: Gain 3 Dexterity until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Hunker Down+
cards.description: Gain 4 Dexterity until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Illusion Of Calm
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.

cards.name: Illusion Of Calm+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Become Frail for 3 turns. Frail amount is reduced for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Keen Edge
cards.description: Apply 4 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Keen Edge+
cards.description: Apply 4 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Magic Missile
cards.description: Deal 3 damage for each time the deck was shuffled this combat.

cards.name: Magic Missile+

cards.name: Magic Weapon

Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Weapon+

Gain 3 Strength. Add a Blade Burst+ to your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Metamagic
cards.description: Gain 2 mysticmod:Spellpower.

cards.name: Metamagic+
cards.description: Gain 3 mysticmod:Spellpower.

cards.name: Mirror Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: For every two stacks of [#5299DC]Power[], deal another 7 damage.

cards.name: Mirror Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: For every two stacks of [#5299DC]Power[], deal another 9 damage.

cards.name: Power Attack
cards.description:
Gain !mysticmod:M2! Strength and lose 2 Dexterity this turn.
mysticmod:Feat.

cards.name: Power Attack+
cards.description:
Gain !mysticmod:M2! Strength and lose 1 Dexterity this turn.
mysticmod:Feat.

cards.name: Prepared Caster
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose one [#5299DC]Spell[] from your draw pile and add it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepared Caster+
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose one [#5299DC]Spell[] from your draw pile and add it to your hand.
Exhaust.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Punishing Armor+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 4 Thorns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rapid Caster

cards.name: Rapid Caster+
cards.description:
Innate.
The first mysticmod:Cantrip you play each turn is played twice.

cards.name: Spell Combat
cards.description:
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Deal 6 damage X times.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 5 Block X times.

cards.name: Spell Combat+
cards.description:
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Deal 8 damage X times.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 7 Block X times.

cards.name: Stoneskin
cards.description:
Gain 2 Block.
Gain mysticmod:Stoneskin for 3 turns.

cards.name: Stoneskin+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Block.
Gain mysticmod:Stoneskin for 4 turns.

cards.name: Style Change
cards.description:
Add a random [#FF5252]Arte[] to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Style Change+
cards.description:
Add a random [#FF5252]Arte[] to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Vorpal Thrust
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Increase base damage by 6 for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Vorpal Thrust+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
[#5299DC]Powerful[]: Increase base damage by 8 for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

cards.name: Closing Barrage
cards.description: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by 3.

cards.name: Closing Barrage+
cards.description: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by 3.

cards.name: Discipline
cards.description: Begin each turn with 1 [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Discipline+
cards.description: Begin each turn with 2 [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[].

cards.name: Disintegrate
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
Ignores Block.

cards.name: Disintegrate+
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
Ignores Block.

cards.name: Doublecast
cards.description: This turn, your next [#5299DC]Spell[] is played twice.

cards.name: Doublecast+
cards.description: This turn, your next two [#5299DC]Spells[] are played twice.

cards.name: Enchanted Moulinet
cards.description: Deal 18 damage to ALL enemies. For each enemy that dies, gain [E] .

cards.name: Enchanted Moulinet+
cards.description: Deal 21 damage to ALL enemies. For each enemy that dies, gain [E] .

cards.name: Gemini Form
cards.description:
For the first [#5299DC]Spell[] and [#FF5252]Arte[] you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Gemini Form+
cards.description: For the first [#5299DC]Spell[] and [#FF5252]Arte[] you play each turn, play a random card of the other type from your draw pile.

cards.name: Greater Invisibility
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust, Ethereal.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Does not Exhaust if you played 2 [#FF5252]Artes[] this turn.

cards.name: Greater Invisibility+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust, Ethereal.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Does not Exhaust if you played 1 [#FF5252]Arte[] this turn.

cards.name: Haste
cards.description: For X turns, draw 1 card, gain [E] , deal 1 more damage with your attacks, and gain 1 more Block from your cards.

cards.name: Haste+
cards.description: For X+1 turns, draw 1 card, gain [E] , deal 1 more damage with your attacks, and gain 1 more Block from your cards.

cards.name: Knowledge Pool
cards.description:
Choose one of 3 random [#5299DC]Spell[] cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Knowledge Pool+
cards.description:
Choose one of 3 random [#5299DC]Spell[] cards and add it to your hand. it costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lunge
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Draw 2 cards.
Lose 4 Dexterity this turn.
Exhaust. mysticmod:Feat.

cards.name: Lunge+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Draw 2 cards.
Lose 4 Dexterity this turn.
Exhaust. mysticmod:Feat.

cards.name: Mirror Entity
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] also advance next turn's [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] counters.

cards.name: Mirror Entity+
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] also advance next turn's [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] counters.

cards.name: Momentum
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] deal more damage and gain more Block for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[] or [#5299DC]Power[] respectively.

cards.name: Momentum+
cards.description: [#5299DC]Spells[] and [#FF5252]Artes[] deal more damage and gain more Block for each stack of [#FF5252]Poise[] or [#5299DC]Power[] respectively.

cards.name: Mystical Shield
cards.description: Block is reduced to 8 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Mystical Shield+
cards.description: Block is set to 8 instead of 0 at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Natural 20
cards.description:
Your next Attack this turn does double damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Natural 20+
cards.description: Your next Attack this turn does double damage.

cards.name: Obscuring Mist
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Obscuring Mist+
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
[#FF5252]Poised[]: Gain 2 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spell Recall
cards.description:
Return a [#5299DC]Spell[] from your discard pile to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spell Recall+
cards.description: Return a [#5299DC]Spell[] from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Spellstrike
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Search your draw pile for an Attack [#5299DC]Spell[] and play it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spellstrike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Search your draw pile for an Attack [#5299DC]Spell[] and play it.

cards.name: Spontaneous Caster
cards.description:
Whenever you play a [#5299DC]Spell[], exhaust it and add a random [#5299DC]Spell[] to your discard pile.
All [#5299DC]Spells'[] costs are reduced to [E] .

cards.name: Spontaneous Caster+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you play a [#5299DC]Spell[], exhaust it and add a random [#5299DC]Spell[] to your discard pile.
All [#5299DC]Spells'[] costs are reduced to [E] .

relics.name: Spell Book
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A special tome unique to every caster. Contains records of spells that only the writer understands.

relics.name: Training Manual
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random Arte to your hand
relics.flavorText: An instructional booklet containing illustrated diagrams for various fighting styles. The handwriting is oddly familiar.

relics.name: Rabbit's Foot
relics.description: Whenever you play an Arte, Gain 1 block.
relics.flavorText: Said to bring good luck to its holder.

relics.name: Runic Prism
relics.description: Whenever you play a Spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: The dark side of the moon god.

relics.name: Kama
relics.description: Every fifth card you play, gain 1 Strength if that card was an Arte, and gain 1 Dexterity if that card was a Spell.
relics.flavorText: Commonly used to reap wheat and souls.

relics.name: Blessed Book
relics.description: Replaces SpellBook. Every 2 turns, add a random mysticmod:Cantrip to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A powerful Spell Book enchanted with mysterious magics.

relics.name: Crystal Ball
relics.description: All non Arte skills are Spells, and all non Spell attacks are Artes.
relics.flavorText: Cannot interface with Palantír, Pensieves, Scryballs, Gramerhain, Shiral crystals, or Urim and Thummim

relics.name: Deck Of Many Things
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. At the end of each turn, if you did not play two Spells and two Artes, lose 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: It's a mystery why anyone would represent magical effects as a deck of cards.

relics.name: Bent Spoon
relics.description: mysticmod:Cantrips deal 1 additional damage and Gain 1 additional Block.
relics.flavorText: What Lee doesn't want you to know is that there is no spoon.

potions.name: Essence Of Magic
potions.description: Add 2 random Cantrips to your hand.

keywords.name: [B]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [E]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [G]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [R]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [W]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: Artifact
keywords.description: Negates the next debuff.

keywords.name: Autoplay
keywords.description: This card automatically plays itself when drawn.

keywords.name: Block
keywords.description: Until next turn, prevents damage.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Burns are unplayable status cards that damage you.

keywords.name: Calm
keywords.description: Upon exiting this Stance, gain [W] [W] .

keywords.name: Channel
keywords.description: Channeling an Orb puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, your first Orb is automatically Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Confused
keywords.description: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

keywords.name: Curse
keywords.description: Curse cards are negative cards that stay in your deck.

keywords.name: Dark
keywords.description: Orb: Increases damage every turn. When Evoked, deals damage to the enemy with the least HP.

keywords.name: Dazed
keywords.description: Dazed are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Dexterity
keywords.description: Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.

keywords.name: Divinity
keywords.description: Upon entering this stance, gain [W] [W] [W] . Attacks deal triple damage. Exit this Stance at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Ethereal
keywords.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

keywords.name: Evoke
keywords.description: Consume your rightmost Orb and use its Evoke effect.

keywords.name: Exhaust
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat.

keywords.name: Exhaustive
keywords.description: Exhausts after a certain number of uses.

keywords.name: Fetch
keywords.description: Choose a specified card from a specified pile and place it into your hand.

keywords.name: Fleeting
keywords.description: This card Purges and is removed from your deck on use.

keywords.name: Focus
keywords.description: Focus increases the effectiveness of Channeled Orbs.

keywords.name: Frail
keywords.description: While Frail, gain 25% less Block from cards.

keywords.name: Frost
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Block.

keywords.name: Grave
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Innate
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

keywords.name: Intangible
keywords.description: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to 1.

keywords.name: Lightning
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Lock-on
keywords.description: Lock-On targets receive 50% more damage from Orbs.

keywords.name: Locked
keywords.description: This card has yet to be unlocked.

keywords.name: Mantra
keywords.description: When you obtain 10 Mantra, enter Divinity.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:cantrip
keywords.description: Considered a Spell so long as you have fewer than 2 stacks of Power.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:feat
keywords.description: Can only be played as the first Arte of the turn.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:spellpower
keywords.description: Increases the Block gained from and damage dealt by Spells.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:stoneskin
keywords.description: Gives 2 block at the start of each turn. This block is affected by any block-affecting powers.

keywords.name: Mysticmod:technique
keywords.description: Increases the Block gained from and damage dealt by Artes.

keywords.name: Opener
keywords.description: Opener cards may only be played as the first card each turn.

keywords.name: Plasma
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Energy.

keywords.name: Poison
keywords.description: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat. Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Refund
keywords.description: Returns energy spent on playing the card, up to the Refund value.

keywords.name: Regen
keywords.description: Regen heals HP at the end of your turn. Each turn, Regen is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Retain
keywords.description: Not discarded at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Scry
keywords.description: Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

keywords.name: Shiv
keywords.description: Shivs are 0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.

keywords.name: Snecko
keywords.description: When drawn, this card randomizes its cost.

keywords.name: Soulbound
keywords.description: Cannot be removed from your deck.

keywords.name: Stance
keywords.description: You can only have one stance at a time.

keywords.name: Startup
keywords.description: Triggers at the start of each combat.

keywords.name: Status
keywords.description: Status cards are removed at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Strength
keywords.description: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

keywords.name: Strike
keywords.description: Any card with the word "Strike" in its name.

keywords.name: Temporary hp
keywords.description: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Thorns
keywords.description: When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.

keywords.name: Transform
keywords.description: Transformed cards become a random card of any rarity.

keywords.name: Unknown
keywords.description: This card has yet to be encountered.

keywords.name: Unplayable
keywords.description: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

keywords.name: Upgrade
keywords.description: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Your next Attack deals additional damage.

keywords.name: Void
keywords.description: Voids are unplayable status cards that consume energy when drawn.

keywords.name: Vulnerable
keywords.description: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Weak
keywords.description: Weakened creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: Wound
keywords.description: Wounds are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Wrath
keywords.description: In this Stance, you deal and receive double attack damage.
